name: Team Aperture
description:
****Headphone use preferred for best experience!****

As an urban explorer,  Bella, you find yourself trapped after solving a mystery that led you to a remote castle in modern day Romania puzzle. As the castle doors close, a new, more dangerous mystery presents itself before you. It's your job to survive the hunt and solve the story of the Curse of Archdale.

Team:

Jessejames Aguigui: Level Designer, Narrative Designer, and Co-Producer 

Parker Nelson: Product Owner, Co-Producer, Tester 

Mike Diston: Systems Design, Level Designer, Tester. 

Casey LaBay: Art Lead, Environment Modelling, Texturing, Animation 

Ethan Taylor: Character Rigs, Animations, Prop Modelling, Texturing 

Shanrae Powell : Character Modelling, Prop Modelling, Environment, Texturing 

Jarod Huber: Programming
